## About

This website presents the vignettes developed for _A review on competing risks
methods for survival analysis_ by Monterrubio-Gómez et al.

This project consists of four vignettes each dedicated to different
formulations: Cumulative incidence, Cause specific,  Discrete, and those outside
of these categories (others). 

## Using this website

The navigation bar at the top of each page can be used to view each vignette.
Clicking on the Github logo in the top-right corner will allow you to view
the source code used to generate these vignettes. There, you will also find 
instructions for reproducing the reports.
